item.title: AWS API Gateway Authorizer Patterns
item.description: Introduction AWS API Gateway Authorizers are a powerful tool to secure API Gateway endpoints. The configuration of Authorizers can be a bit overwhelming at first. There are many options which have an impact on the security, performance and programming model of your API Gateway. This article is a collection of three patterns that I have identified from my experience with AWS API Gateway Authorizers, from discussions with peers and colleagues and from existing documentation online.
